data.homeworkTitle: 第二章第三节支气管哮喘

questions.title: 哮喘持续状态病人的护理不正确的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"保持有效吸氧","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"保持呼吸道通畅","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"加快输液速度，以纠正脱水，防止痰液黏塞","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"专人护理，消除病人紧张恐惧心理","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"严密观察血压、脉搏、呼吸及神志的变化","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 哮喘持续状态是指哮喘发作严重，持续多长时间以上
患者男性，70岁。因突然停用糖皮质激素出现哮喘重度发作，表现为端坐呼吸明显发绀大汗淋漓，呼吸频率32次／分钟，脉搏120次／分钟血压90／60mmHg。宜选用的药物是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"酮替芬","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"色甘酸钠","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"喘定","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"肾上腺素","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"氨茶碱","IsAnswer":true}]

questions.title: 患者男性，25岁。因外出春游去植物园，出现咳嗽咳痰伴喘息1天入院。喘息貌，口唇发绀，住肺部可闻及广泛哮鸣音。医疗诊断是支气管哮喘。对支气管哮喘患者，下列护理措施正确的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"平卧位","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"给予面罩吸氧，氧流量6～1OL／min","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"限制水分摄入","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"痰黏者雾化吸入","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"食用鱼虾等高蛋白食物","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 患者女性，25岁。经过装修工地后出现干咳气急胸闷呼吸困难。经治疗后好转。对该患者的健康教育内容，不正确的是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"调整环境","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"适当锻炼","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"注意饮食","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"饲养宠物","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"免疫治疗","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 患者，男性，32岁，在进入某旅馆时出现流鼻涕、打喷嚏，继而出现明显喘憋查体；呼气音延长，满肺广泛哮鸣音，最可能的原因是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"喉头水肿","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"急性支气管炎","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"慢性阻塞性肺气肿","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"支气管哮喘","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"急性肺水肿","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.title: 支气管哮喘与心源性哮喘主要区别是
questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"有无反复发作","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"有无湿罗音","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"有无心血管病史","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"有无过敏史","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"有无哮鸣音","IsAnswer":false}]

questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"过敏原吸入","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"感染","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"食物","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"气候变化","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"剧烈运动","IsAnswer":false}]
